value.name: The Fruit of Evolution: Before I Knew It, My Life Had It Made
value.original_name: 進化の実～知らないうちに勝ち組人生～
value.overview: High school student Hiiragi Seiichi is bullied by his classmates for being a "loser." One day, his entire school is suddenly transported to a video game-like world of swords and sorcery. When he accidentally eats "the Fruit of Evolution," his life as a successful "winner" begins.
